subject: Bank of Hawaii,
body:
Bank of Hawaii,
 ACH Operations 121, P.O. Box 71160,
 Honolulu, HI 96807-1160.
Dear BENEFICIARY
I wish to humbly inform you that the total sum of $25.82 million  has just been approved for immediate release to your bank coordinates..
This notice was released this last Friday been released by the CEO, Mr. Peter S.Ho
Kindly make available your full bank details now for this release process.
IS THIS BANK DETAILS CORRECT?
 
BANK NAME IS:  ALLY BANK
BANK ADDRESS:   P.O. BOX 13625
                                  PHILADELPHIA, PA 19101
ROUTING  NUMBER IS:   124003116
ACCOUNT NUMBER IS:   2117268173
BANK PHONE NUMBER      1-877-247-2559
NAME ON ACCT: MICHAEL CRAIG RIXIE
Always copy my alternative email below
Congratulation.
Best Rgd,
LINDA BENJAMIN
Chief Compliance Officer
Telex Dept
BANK OF HAWAII
ALT. EMAIL. 
clearanceissuingofficer@gmail.com

subject: Re:   Bank of Hawaii,
body:
Dear Linda Benjamin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding the release of a substantial sum of money. However, before proceeding further, I would like to clarify a few things.

Firstly, could you please provide more details about the approval process? Who exactly approved this release and what is their position within the bank? It would be helpful to have some additional information to ensure that everything is legitimate.

Secondly, I noticed that you mentioned providing my full bank details for the release process. Could you please explain why this information is necessary? I want to make sure that my personal and financial security is not compromised in any way.

Lastly, it would be great if you could provide a contact number for your bank's customer service department. This way, I can verify the authenticity of this communication by speaking directly with a representative from Bank of Hawaii.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Don

subject: ANTONIO
body:
HI  ANTONIO,
Kindly respond through this email and forward all your earlier unresponded
messages through also.
TREAT AS URGENT


SECURE THESE PAPERS AS A MATTER OF URGENT PRIORITY
1. fund release clearance permit which allows for irrevocable release of
your fund at reduced cost of $1,100.00
2.certificate of fund origin at the cost of $1,100.00

6. Financial Crimes Enforcement Network,,,$850.00

8..IRS clearance,$1100.00
TOTAL COST IS $7550.00--

To: <ct20678@***.com>

prior to fund release to avoid stoppage or queries after fund is released
on both parties. Go through the earlier mentioned clearance permits and it
will be  very clear to you. Are you unaware of clearance permi
 from Interpol etc?

Hi Antonio,

Thank you for your response. The fund release clearance permit is a necessary document required by financial monitoring agencies to ensure the smooth release of funds without any issues or delays. It basically serves as a clearance certificate that authorizes the transfer of funds securely.

If you have any specific questions or need further clarification on how the process works, feel free to ask. I'm here to help guide you through it.

Best wishes,
Don
